text: Balham station is the name given to the London Underground and the National Rail stations in the Balham area of south London, England. The station is on the A24 Balham High Road in the London Borough of Wandsworth. It is in Travelcard Zone 3. == References == == Other websites == * London's Transport Museum Photographic Archive ** ** ** ** ** == Gallery == Image:Balham station entrance north side.JPG|Tube station entrance, west side image:Balham station Northern line roundel.JPG|Roundel on northbound Northern line platform image:Balham station Northern line northbound look north.JPG|Northbound Northern line platform looking north Category:Northern line stations Category:Transport in the London Borough of Wandsworth Category:Railway stations opened in 1863 Category:Buildings and structures in the London Borough of Wandsworth
title: Balham station
